ComicInfo.Summary: HACK/SLASH creator Tim Seeley has made a gift for you -- a gift of horror! This free digital comic HACK/SLASH short serves as a good introduction to the fan-favorite series and a gesture of good will from a man who's made the creation and slaying of comic book serial killers his job!
